customProperties.armorEffects: You gain resistance to Force Damage, any fly speed you have is increased by 10ft.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Cosmium weapons roll double the damage die, and take the highest result.
customProperties.additionalEffects: Cosmium Painters tools can create real life objects by painting them. Objects last for 1 minute and cannot have a value greater than 10gp.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: You gain resistance to Force Damage, any fly speed you have is increased by 10ft.
Weapon Effects: Cosmium weapons roll double the damage die, and take the highest result.
Additional Effects: Cosmium Painters tools can create real life objects by painting them. Objects last for 1 minute and cannot have a value greater than 10gp.
